narrative.title: 21 Panzer Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: German panzer_division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Panzer division reorganized as battle groups (Kampfgruppen) for Kasserine Pass offensive. Mission: Destroy US II Corps, recapture initiative in Tunisia. Coordinated attack with 10th Panzer Division.
narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.

weather.terrain: Tunisian mountains - Kasserine Pass, Faïd Pass, Maizila Pass. Atlas Mountains foothills. Rocky, mountainous terrain with narrow passes.

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Kampfgruppe flexibility - combined arms battle groups
Skilled at mobile defense and counterattack

environment.terrain_type: Tunisian mountains - Kasserine Pass, Faïd Pass, Maizila Pass. Atlas Mountains foothills. Rocky, mountainous terrain with narrow passes.
